dt: {bc}an institution devoted to the procurement, care, study, and display of objects of lasting interest or value

et: Latin {it}Museum{/it} place for learned occupation, from Greek {it}Mouseion{/it}, from neuter of {it}Mouseios{/it} of the Muses, from {it}Mousa{/it}
shortdef: an institution devoted to the procurement, care, study, and display of objects of lasting interest or value; also : a place where objects are exhibited

dt: {bc}something preserved in or suitable for a museum
{bc}one that is out-of-date {bc}a thing of the past

shortdef: something preserved in or suitable for a museum
one that is out-of-date : a thing of the past

dt: {bc}a place where wax effigies (as of famous historical persons) are exhibited

shortdef: a place where wax effigies (as of famous historical persons) are exhibited

dt: {bc}a museum that shows objects relating to the history of a place

shortdef: a museum that shows objects relating to the history of a place
